//http://www.codechef.com/problems/CREDROPE
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
	int len,i,flag=0; scanf("%d",&len);    char str[len];  flag=0;
	 float A,F,check,bal=0.0;
	scanf("%s",str);
	scanf("%f%f",&A,&F); //printf("%f   %f\n",A,F);
	for(i=0;i<len;i++)
	{
		if(str[i]=='L')
		{
			bal=bal-A; 
			check=bal;
			if(bal<0) check=(-1)*bal;
			if(check>=F)
			{
				flag=1; break;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			bal=bal+A;  check=bal;
			if(bal<0) check=(-1)*bal;
			if(check>=F)
			{
				flag=1; break;
			}
		}
	}
	if(flag) printf("NO\n");
	else printf("YES\n");
	return 0;
}
